target: Just about every lodging in town has internet (it's 2017, after all!). Do you have a certain area or price range in mind?
context: <user> I will be in Cambridge and am looking for some places to go in the centre while I visit. <system> I'd be happy to help you pick one! There are over 40 attractions in city centre; what type of activity are you interested in? <user> I don't really care. Can you suggest something? <system> How about a museum? Or we have some terrific colleges you could visit. There's always the theatre as well. <user> How about a theatre? Can you give me the post code and phone number for one, please? <system> The Cambridge Arts Theatre is located at 6 saint edward's passage in postcode cb23pj. Their phone number is 01223503333. <user> Thank you! Can you help me find a hotel to stay in? I need it to have free wifi. <system>
